expert_strategy_notes.email_1: Initial - create curiosity, under 75 words, soft CTA
expert_strategy_notes.email_2: Day 3, same thread - add value, don't just bump, under 50 words
expert_strategy_notes.email_3: Day 6, NEW thread - different angle, lower friction offer, under 60 words
expert_strategy_notes.subject_line: 2-4 words, looks like from colleague, NO 'quick question'
expert_strategy_notes.first_line: Preview text - create curiosity, NOT a pitch
